casebody.data:
McKernan v. New York El. R. Co. et al. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. July 2, 1891.) Appeal from special term. Action by Eliza McKernan against the New York Elevated Railroad Company and the Manhattan Railway Company. There was a judgment for plaintiff, and defendant appeals.

Argued before Freedman, Dugro, and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Jeroloman & Arrowsmith, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
